props.name: is-horizontal
props.description: Controlling field and label for horizontal position

props.name: is-narrow
props.description: Used to narrowed controls. Use it with is-horizontal

props.name: is-grouped-multiline
props.description: Used it with is-grouped attribute. To allow controls to fill up multiple lines.

props.name: size
props.description: Used to adjust size of label. And will be applied to form component inside it. If the child is direct child of g-field
props.values: small, medium, large. The value is same as the css size class applied to the bulma without using `is` prefix

props.name: type
props.description: Used to adjust colors of help message. And will be applied to form component inside it. If the child is direct child of g-field
props.values: info, danger, warning, success, primary, etc. The value is same as the css colors class applied to the bulma without using `is` prefix

props.name: position
props.description: Used to positioning child of the g-field component. Used it with has-addons & is-grouped properties

props.name: shape
props.description:
Used to formatting the child of g-field component

. Work with g-input & g-select
